SA15bsa061_u:2_5: bāhyārthavādinaḥ kila vijñānamātratāyāṃ santānāntarasattā nopapadyata iti codayanti /
SA15bsa061_u:2_6: tathāhi, ta evamāhuḥ - yeṣāṃ cittamātrameva sat,
SA15bsa061_u:2_7: asaṃśca bāhyārthaḥ, na teṣāṃ prāṇyantarapratipattaye pratyakṣapramāṇamasti;
SA15bsa061_u:2_9: vastutastu ālambanābhāvāt / nāpyanumānam, kāyavākkarmābhāvāt / atha kāyavāgvijñaptibhyāṃ prāṇyantaramanumīyate cet;
SA15bsa061_u:3_0: nāpyāgamaḥ sambhavati, tasya rūpaskandhāntarbhāvāt, etasya ca pratikṣepāt / tathāhi, āgamaḥ śabdātmako vā bhaved vyañjanasvabhāvo vā /
SA15bsa061_u:3_4: tathā sati, āgamādapi prāṇyantaraṃ pratipattuṃ na śakyata iti cet?
SA15bsa061_u:4_5: sa tu pratipattṛsantāne sannapyupacāratastathāgatasya vā kapilasya vā kaṇādasya vā karturvacanamiti vyapadiśyate /
SA15bsa061_u:4_6: evaṃ sarve 'pi bauddhā vācakaṃ śabdasāmānyākāraṃ jñānaṃ manyante;
SA15bsa061_u:4_7: na cāsti śabdaviśeṣaḥ, 'tasya pūrvamadṛṣṭatvād' ityādihetubhiḥ viśeṣākārasya vācakatvabhāvapratiṣedhāt /
SA15bsa061_u:4_9: api tvanumānāt / taccānumānaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇorabhāve 'pi yathā pravartate yaddarśayitumāha - buddhipūrvāmityādi /
SA15bsa061_u:5_0: avayavārthastūcyate / buddhiḥ jñānam / sā cātra gamanāgamanasaṃlāpecchārūpā parigṛhyate,
SA15bsa061_u:5_1: kriyāhetutvāt tasyāḥ / sāsti pūrvaṃ yasyāḥ kriyāyāḥ sā buddhipūrvā /
SA15bsa061_u:5_3: kāraṇasya pūrvavartitvāt / yadi nāma bāhyārthavādibhiḥ svasantāne tāṃ buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāmupalabhya paścātparasantāne grahād vivakṣitarūpā dhīḥ vijñānaṃ gamyate,
SA15bsa061_u:7_0: ātmani cittaspandanapūrvau kriyābhilāpau dṛṣṭvānyatra tayordarśanād yadi spandanamanumīyeta,
SA15bsa061_u:7_6: tenāyamartho bhavati - ātmani jigamiṣāvivakṣāpūrvayoḥ kriyābhilāpayordarśanāt parasantāne 'pi tau kriyābhilāpau copalabhya cittaspandanamanumīyata iti cet? cittamātratāvāde 'pyeṣa nayaḥ samaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:7_7: tathā sati, so 'pi paracittamanumīyāt / atra spandanetyaviśeṣeṇoktam,
SA15bsa061_u:8_0: nanu bāhyārthavāde tu paracittanimittake kāyavākkarmaṇī liṅgatvena svīkriyete,
SA15bsa061_u:8_1: antarjñeyavāde tayorabhāvāt kathaṃ sāmyamiti cet? evamāha -
SA15bsa061_u:9_0: tacca kāyavāgvijñaptipratibhāsi jñānaṃ jñānāntaraspandanaviśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatītyevaṃ na matam /
SA15bsa061_u:9_1: taccetyādi / antarjñeyavādināpi kāyavāgvijñāptipratibhāsi kāyavāgvijñaptakārakaṃ jñānaṃ paracittasya spandanaviśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatīti na manyate /
SA15bsa061_u:11_0: atha parajñānasya kriyāyā anupalambhāt paradhīranumātuṃ na yujyata iti cet? na;
SA15bsa061_u:11_2: na bhavatā kadāpi parajñānapūrvake kriyāvāgākārake jñāne upalabhyete /
SA15bsa061_u:11_4: antarjñeyavādyāha - na; tulyatvāditi / naiṣa doṣaḥ / yato hi, eṣa upālambho bhavatāmapi tulyaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:13_0: paro 'pi parajñānapūrvau tau kadāpi na paśyati /
SA15bsa061_u:13_1: ataḥ tenāpi tanna jñāyate / paro 'pītyādi / bāhyārthavādyapi paracittaspandanapūrvakau tau kriyābhilāpau na kadāpi paśyati /
SA15bsa061_u:15_0: ātmanaścittasya paravartinornimittatvānupapatteḥ paracittaṃ jñāyata it cet? kiṃ na yujyate? ātmanaścittasya paravartinorityādi /
SA15bsa061_u:15_1: yasmādātmanaścittaṃ santānāntaravartinoḥ kriyābhilāpayoḥ kāraṇatvena na yujyate,
SA15bsa061_u:17_4: na tāvadātmacittaminittakau, yasmānna svasantāne tayorsamutthāpakacoittasya saṃvedanaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa061_u:19_1: ātmacittaśrayiṇoścetyādi / ahaṃ gacchāmi, ahaṃ vadāmīti ye svacittanimittake kāravākkarmaṇī te svasantāne upalabhyete /
SA15bsa061_u:20_0: bhavatvātmacittanimittakayoḥ svasantāne darśanam / tena kim? tasmādāha -
SA15bsa061_u:23_1: ayaṃ gacchati, ayaṃ vadatītyevaṃ vicchinnadeśe dṛśyete /
SA15bsa061_u:25_1: aparasminnapītyādi / antarjñeyavāde 'pi svasantāne vicchinnadeśapratibhāsinoḥ kriyābhilāpapratibhāsijñānayoḥ samutthāpakacittasya pratisaṃvedanaṃ na bhavati /
SA15bsa061_u:27_0: svacittaspandananimittake vijñāptipratibhāsinī jñāne cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī pratīteḥ bahirmukhapratibhāsinī anyanimittāditpadyete /
SA15bsa061_u:27_2: ye svacittaspandananimittake kriyāvākpratibhāsinī jñāne te cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī 'ahaṃ gacchami,
SA15bsa061_u:30_1: ye bahirmukhapratibhāsinī jñāne te 'nimitte iti kinneṣyete? na spandananimittale iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:30_5: bhavatu kila nimittāmātrasya pratiṣedhaḥ tathāpi prakaraṇavaśāt spandanamātrasya pratiṣedho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:32_1: animittatva ityādi / yadi vicchinnapratibhāsinī kriyāvāgākārake jñāne spandanābhāve 'pi vinā kiṃcana kriyāvāgākāraṃ bhavet,
SA15bsa061_u:32_2: tadā sarvāṇyapi kriyāvāgākārakāṇi jñānāni spandanena vinā bhaveyuḥ;
SA15bsa061_u:34_3: ata āha - vicchinnāvicchinnapratibhāsakṛto bhedo na jñānayoḥ spandanatvanimittabhedavibhāgakṛt /
SA15bsa061_u:34_7: sa tu yato na jñānayoḥ spandanatvanimittasya bhedakaḥ;
SA15bsa061_u:35_0: atha nimittatvabhedābhāve ko doṣaḥ syāt? āha -
SA15bsa061_u:36_1: viśeṣābhāvāt / tenāvicchinnetyādi / yato hyatra bhinnabhūtayoḥ jñānayoḥ kriyāvākpratibhāsatve na kaścid viśeṣo 'sti /
SA15bsa061_u:38_0: tathā sati, avicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsabheda eva spandanapūrvako na bhavati /
SA15bsa061_u:39_2: tasmād yo 'vicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ kriyāvākpratibhāsaḥ sa kevalaṃ spandananimittako na bhavati /
SA15bsa061_u:39_7: tenātrāyaṃ samudāyārthaḥ - vicchinnāvicchinnabhedamanapekṣya sāmānyena kriyābhilāpayoḥ pratibhāsamātraṃ spandananimittakam /
SA15bsa061_u:39_8: yato hi kaścid vicchinno 'pi pratibhāsa spandanapūrvako dṛśyate,
SA15bsa061_u:42_0: śaropalaprakṣepaṇetayādi / śarāścopalāśca śaropalam, śaropalau ca / tayoḥ śaropalayoḥ prakṣepaṇamiti vigrahaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:42_1: śaropalaprakṣepaṇāni yantraṃ ca nirmāṇaṃ ca parapracālanaṃ cetivigrahaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:42_10: etaduktaṃ bhavati - vicchinnapratibhāso 'spandanapūrvakatvena na vyāpta iti /
SA15bsa061_u:46_0: tena hyatra kriyāviśeṣamātreṇa spandanasya pratītiriti yujyate /
SA15bsa061_u:48_1: tadanyā vicchinnapratibhāsāstu na tathā syuḥ? tasmādāha - tatra yadi kasyacidapūrvakatvam,
SA15bsa061_u:48_2: na ko 'pi tatpūrvaka syāt; viśeṣābhāvāt / tatra yadi kasyacidapūrvakatvamityādi /
SA15bsa061_u:51_1: yato hi yadi kasyacidatatpūrvakatvaṃ bhavet sarvasyātatpūrvakatvaṃ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa061_u:51_5: na hyevaṃ śakyate 'numātum - ṃrāgād vadatīti vā dveṣādvā mohādvā /
SA15bsa061_u:51_7: na tu spandanaviśeṣam; viśeṣe liṅgasya vyabhiucāraditi /
SA15bsa061_u:53_0: tatra yathā kriyāmupalabhya, ātmani spandanānupalambhādanyatra spandapratītiḥ;
SA15bsa061_u:54_2: ātmani spandanānupalambhāt sāmarthyādanyatra spandanamanumīyata iti cet /
SA15bsa061_u:57_0: samānametadityādi / bāhyārthavādyapi prāṇyantarasaṃbaddhapratibhāsinau kriyābhilāpau animittakāviti necchati /
SA15bsa061_u:58_1: tadavaśyamabhyupagantavyamiti darśayitumāha - tenāvaśyaṃ tau spandananimittakatvāttadabhāve na bhavata iti vaktavyam /
SA15bsa061_u:59_0: tenāvaśyamityādi / tathāvipratipannena bāhyārthavādināvaśyamiyamupapattirvaktavyā - tayoḥ kriyābhilāpayoḥ spandanajanyarūpatvāt spandanābhāve tau na bhavata iti /
SA15bsa061_u:61_0: paro 'pi tayoḥ pratibhāsau tathaiva vadet / ataḥ nānayoḥ parasparaṃ bhedaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:62_1: antarjñeyavādyapi tathaiva vadet - vicchinnapratibhāsijñāne spandanajanyarūpatvāttadabhāve na bhavata iti /
SA15bsa061_u:62_2: tathā sati nānayoḥ bāhyārthavādāntarjñeyavādayoḥ parasparaṃ bhedo 'sti /
SA15bsa061_u:62_3: etaduktaṃ bhavati - yathā bāhyārthavādī parasambaddhakriyābhilāpau spandanajanyarūpatvāt tadabhāve na bhavata iti vadati,
SA15bsa061_u:62_4: tathaivāntarjñeyavādyapi bāhirmukhapratibhāsijñāne spandanajanyatvāt tadabhāve na bhavata iti vadet /
SA15bsa061_u:64_0: yadi tatra pratibhāsinyoḥ spandananimittakatvamucyate, svapnāvasthāyāmapi kinnocyate?
SA15bsa061_u:65_1: kriyābhilāpapratibhāsijñānayoḥ spandananimittakatvaṃ vadan yogācāraḥ svapnāvasthāyāmapi tayoḥ spandananimittakatvaṃ kinna vadatīti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā /
SA15bsa061_u:67_0: sarvaṃ samānam / paro 'pi svapnopalabdhaparakriyāvācau spandananimittike iti kinna vadati?
SA15bsa061_u:68_0: sarvaṃ samānamityādi / na kevalaṃ pūrvaṃ samānam / kiṃ tarhi? etadapi pūrveṇa saha sarvaṃ samānamiti śeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:68_2: bāhyārthavādyapi svapnāvasthāyāṃ yau parasambaddhau kriyābhilāpāvupalabhyete tau paracittanimittakāviti kinna vadati /
SA15bsa061_u:71_0: tayorabhāvāditi cediti / svapne tu kriyābhilāpāveva na staḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:76_0: atha middhenopahatatvāt puruṣasyārthaśūnyaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyata iti cet /
SA15bsa061_u:80_0: paramata ityādi / antarjñeyavādīnāṃ mate 'pitasmāt middhena bhrāntatvādeva parādhipatyarahite kriyābhilāpākāreke jñāne jāyete itīṣṭam /
SA15bsa061_u:81_0: evaṃ tāvat sautrāntikena saha samānatāṃ pratipādya vaibhāṣikamatāśaṅkyāha -
SA15bsa061_u:82_0: atha svapne 'pi jñānasyārthavattvāttadopalabhyamānānyapi santānāntarāṇyeva iti cet /
SA15bsa061_u:83_1: svapne 'pi jñānasyārthavattvāt svapnāvasthāyāṃ yeṣāṃ prāṇināmupalabdhirbhavati te ca sattvāḥ santyeva satyataḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:85_1: tadā parābhimataṃ tasya parādhipatyaṃ na ko 'pi nivārayet /
SA15bsa061_u:86_1: yaḥ yuktyā āgamācca rahitaḥ sa yuktyāgamarahitaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:86_4: anena ca mama parājaya iti / na, ayuktatvāt / tadā yogācārabhimataṃ sattvasya tathāvidhaparadhipatyamapi na kaścinnivārayet /
SA15bsa061_u:86_5: tathāhi, bhavadbhiḥ svapnāvasthāyāṃ ye sattvāḥ abhyupagatāḥ,
SA15bsa061_u:86_6: teṣāmevādhipatyādasmākaṃ vijñaptipratibhāsāḥ jāyanta iti vaktavyaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa061_u:86_7: tena hi yad viṣamatvaṃ yuktyāgamarahitatvaṃ tadevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA15bsa061_u:86_9: yuktyāpi nopapadyate / tathā sati svapnadṛṣṭarūpasya sapratighatvaṃ sanidarśanatvañca bhavet /
SA15bsa061_u:86_10: tena hi hastyādīnāṃ gavākṣādiṣu praveśo nopapadyeta,
SA15bsa061_u:86_13: tadā rūpameva tanna bhavet / nāpyavijñaptiniyamaḥ, tadanabhyupagamāt / yadātmānaṃ bahirgataṃ prekṣate,
SA15bsa061_u:86_17: svapnadṛṣṭarūpasya sadbhāvābhyupagame tvevemādayo bahavo doṣā prasajyante /
SA15bsa061_u:87_0: evaṃ tāvat samānatāṃ prasādhya svapakṣe yuktyāgamarahitatvaṃ parihartumāha -
SA15bsa061_u:88_0: etat keṣāñcinmata eva sarvāṇi tathāvidhāni jñānāni santānāntarāyattāni /
SA15bsa061_u:88_2: etat keṣāñcinmata ityādi / etadityāveśenoktam / keṣāzncid yogācārāṇāṃ mata eva jāgradavasthāvat svapne 'pi tathāvidhānī kriyāvāgākārajñānāni parasantānā yattāni bhavanti /
SA15bsa061_u:93_0: devādyadhiṣṭhānata ityādi / devādyadhiṣṭhānataḥ supriyavaṇijo vijñaptipratibhāsīni jñānāni jāyante ādītyanena yogipiśācādīnāmadhiṣṭhānāni saṃgṛhītāni /
SA15bsa061_u:99_1: muhurbhavataiva paryanuyujyate - kasmāt bhavatparikalpitayā tayā kriyayā paracittaṃ jñāyate /
SA15bsa061_u:102_0: cittasya kāryatvāditi / yasmāccittasya kāryam, tasmāt sā gamikā // 40 //
SA15bsa061_u:104_0: tasya kāryatvaṃ tu cittantare 'pi tulyamiti kathanna jñāyate?
SA15bsa061_u:105_0: tasya kāryatvamityādi kriyā cittasya kāryatvāccittasya gamiketi cet? cittasya tatkāryatvaṃ tu kriyāpratibhāsijñāne 'pi tulyatvāttena kriyāpratibhāsenāpi kasmāt paracittaṃ na jñāyate /
SA15bsa061_u:107_0: api ca, yadi tatkriyā svasattāmātreṇa svasantānaṃ pratyāyet,
SA15bsa061_u:108_0: api ca, yadi tatkriyetyādi / kiñceyaṃ kriyā sattāmātrāt paracittamavabodhayed ohosvit jñānāt? yadi tāvad sattāmātrāditi,
SA15bsa061_u:111_0: na; jñānāpekṣatvādityādi / na hi liṅgaṃ sattāmātrāt gamakaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa061_u:113_0: tadā tatra kimanayā paramparayā - paracittāt kriyā, kriyātaḥ jñānam, jñānāttasya pratipattiriti /
SA15bsa061_u:114_0: tadā tatretyādi syānmatam - liṅga jñānamapekṣya gamakamiti /
SA15bsa061_u:114_1: hanta, tarhi na kiñcit prayojanamanayā paramparayā /
SA15bsa061_u:118_0: kriyetyapi yujyeta, kriyāpratibhāsijñānamityapi yujyeta / kaścātra viśeṣaḥ? tasmād āha -
SA15bsa061_u:122_0: spandanamātrasāmānyāṃ kriyābhilāpajñānasāmānyasya kāraṇatvāt kāryeṇa lāraṇasya gatiḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:122_5: ata eva uktam - kāryeṇa karaṇasya gati iti /
SA15bsa061_u:123_0: evaṃ sāmānyena kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ nirdiśya kāryasya bhedamupadarśayitumāha -
SA15bsa061_u:124_0: tatra ātmaspandananimittakasyāntarmukhavṛttiḥ, anyasyānyathā / prāyeṇādhikṛtya asau bhedaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:126_0: tatra syānmatam - bhavatu jāgradavasthāyāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ, svapnāvasthāyāṃ tu tatkathamiti cet?
SA15bsa061_u:128_0: etayoḥ saḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ svāpādyavasthāyāmitarasyāmapi ca samānaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:129_0: nanu svapne samutthāpakaspandanameva nāsti / tatkathaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasya samānateti / tasmādāha -
SA15bsa061_u:130_0: bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ pratyayaviśeṣopāśrayāt paraspandanādinimittodbhūtavijñānavāsanaiva kadācitparābhogādeḥ vyavahitādapi vṛttiṃ labhate,
SA15bsa061_u:131_3: pratyayaviśeṣo middhādiḥ / upāśrayaṇam upāśrayaḥ / pratyayaviśeṣasya upāśrayaḥ pratyayaviśeṣopāśrayaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:131_6: ādītyanena mukhakāntiraktimādīnāṃ janakacittasya paroigrahaḥ paraspandanādi ca nimittaṃ ceti samāsaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:131_8: yasya kriyādipratibhāsivijñānasya tadanyasmāt spandanādinimittādudbhavituṃ śīlamasti tat paraspandādinimittodbhūtavijñānam /
SA15bsa061_u:131_9: tasya vāsanā śaktiḥ / parābhogaḥ paramanaskāraḥ ādītyanena tatkālabhāvināṃ tadanyapratyayānāṃ parigrahaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:131_10: vyavahitaḥ kālaviprakṛṣṭaḥ / apīti śabdo 'vyavahite devādyadhiṣṭhānāt svapnadarśane 'pi /
SA15bsa061_u:131_12: evamuktaṃ bhavati - bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ pratyayaviśeṣasya upāśrayāt paraspandanādinimittadudbhūtavijñānavāsanā kadācit vyavahitād parābhogādapi vṛttiṃ labhate /
SA15bsa061_u:132_0: evaṃ svapnāvasthāyāmapi kriyāpratibhāsijñānānāṃ spandananimittakatvaṃ sādhayitvā upasaṃhartum āha -
SA15bsa061_u:134_1: tasmāt svāpajāgradubhayorapyavasthayoḥ kriyāpratibhāsāt cittaspandanamanumīyata eveti sthitam /
SA15bsa061_u:136_0: kriyātaḥ spandanapratipattau svāpa itarasmiñca syāt pratipattiratha vā naiva kadācana /
SA15bsa061_u:137_4: tadā tat jāgradavasthāyāmapi yujyeta na kadāciyt kriyātaḥ spandanasya pratipattirbhavediti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:140_0: paraspandanābhāve 'pītyādi / tathāhi, svapne paracittaspandanābhāve 'pi kriyālambanam udeti /
SA15bsa061_u:142_0: bhavatvālambanodayaḥ, na tu kriyā / kriyayā spandanaṃ gamyete / bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ kriyaiva na bhavati /
SA15bsa061_u:143_1: na tu kriyā / asmākaṃ mate kriyā spandanasya gamakam /
SA15bsa061_u:145_2: yasya vyapadeśasya santi sarve prakārāḥ sa sarvaprakāravyapadeśaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:145_5: adhikāro vā bhavatā kuto labdhaḥ? evamuktaṃ bhavati - jāgradavasthāvat svapnāvasthāyāmapi dṛśyākārādayaḥ sarve santi /
SA15bsa061_u:151_0: yadyevaṃ sambhavedityādi / yadi bhrāntivaśādavasthānyathābhāvādarthaśūnyaṃ jñānaṃ jāyata iti abhyupāgamyeta,
SA15bsa061_u:151_1: tadā mahābhramarājñyā avidyāyāḥ sadbhāvāt tadvaśācca sarvāṇi jñānānyarthaśūnyāni jāyanta iti manyeran /
SA15bsa061_u:153_0: tathā satyarthāntaravādahānyā ete 'nekāśakyanigūhanāvatārāḥ mahākṛcchrā uttareṇaikena nihatā bhavanti /
SA15bsa061_u:153_5: yasmārthāntaravādasya aneke avatārāḥ doṣāḥ parihāralakṣaṇenāśakyanigūhanāḥ santyamī anekāśakyanigūhanāvatārāḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:153_8: nihatāḥ nirākṛtāḥ / aśakyanigūhanāvatāratvaṃ tu kṛte ekasya parihāre 'nyānyadoṣodbhavāt /
SA15bsa061_u:154_0: evaṃ santānāntarasiddhiṃ parisamāpyāvaśiṣṭān durupālambhān parihartukāmaḥ paramatamāśaṅkitum āha -
SA15bsa061_u:155_0: nanu tayoḥ darśanāt kāyavāgvijñaptibhyāṃ svamutthāpakacittasyānumānamiti nyāyyam /
SA15bsa061_u:156_5: ye ca śrotṛsantānasambaddhavijñaptipratibhāsijñāne spandanasya gamake iti bhavadbhiriṣṭe,
SA15bsa061_u:156_6: kathaṃ te vaktuḥ vijñaptī syātām? atra santāneti śrotuḥ santānaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:158_0: nocyate paracittasamitthitavijñaptirūpatvāt tatra pratibhāsijñānena samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti /
SA15bsa061_u:159_2: sā yasya pratibhāsino jñānasya rūpaṃ svabhāvo 'sti tattathā /
SA15bsa061_u:159_5: evamuktaṃ bhavati - yasmāt tatra pratibhāsi jñānaṃ paracittasamutthitavijñaptirūpam,
SA15bsa061_u:159_6: tasmāt samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti vayamapi nābhyupagacchāmaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:159_7: yadi nābhyupagamyate, kiṃ tarhi abhyupagamyata iti cet? āha - kiṃ tarhi? tasya kāryatvād iti /
SA15bsa061_u:159_9: tasmāt paracittaṃ gamyate / atra paracittaṃ vaktuścittamabhipretam /
SA15bsa061_u:160_0: yadi śrotṛsantānājjāte kriyāvāgākārake jñāne vijñaptitvena neṣyete,
SA15bsa061_u:161_1: vijñaptirityādi / samutthāpakacittasantānājjāte ye kriyāvāgākārake jñāne te vijñaptitvena vyapadiśyete /
SA15bsa061_u:161_2: evamuktaṃ bhavati - vaktureva ye gamanābhilāpane kriyāvāgākārake jñāne te vijñaptīti ucyete /
SA15bsa061_u:162_0: samutthāpakacittaṃ svaparasantānagatayoḥ kriyāvāgākārakajñāneyoryathā kāraṇabhāvo bhavati taddarśayitumāha -
SA15bsa061_u:165_2: vijñapteryadupādānakāraṇaṃ tena te santānāntarasambaddhakriyāvāgākārake jñāne janite /
SA15bsa061_u:165_3: tajjanisambandhena tena hetunā upacārād vijñaptīti vyapadiśyete /
SA15bsa061_u:166_1: na hi śrotā vaktṛsantānājjāte kriyāvākpratibhāsijñāne upalabhate /
SA15bsa061_u:166_2: tathā hi, vaktā śrotā cobhāvapi svasvapratibhāsamanu bhavataḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:166_3: tatkathaṃ te 'nālambane vijñaptitvena svasamutthāpakasya gamake iti /
SA15bsa061_u:168_0: bhavatu svaparayorityādi / svapareti vaktā śrotā ca / svasya svasya pratibhāsasya anubhavaḥ svasvapratibhāsasyānubhavaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:168_2: tena tulyatvāt tadvat / tathāvidhavijñānamiti ekārthagrāhādhyavasāyi vijñānaṃ matam /
SA15bsa061_u:168_4: tajjanitā vāsanā śaktirūpā / tasyā utpāda utpādavyayalakṣaṇaparamparāyā udayaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:168_5: svarūpa utpādasvabhāvaḥ / tasya viśeṣa ekārthagrāhādhyavasāyivijñānopajanane samarthātmani sthitiḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:169_2: na ādikālikaḥ anādikālikaḥ / ekaścāsau arthaśceti ekārthaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:169_6: tathā hi, vaktā caivaṃ cintayati - yanmayā kathitaṃ tat śrotrā jñātam /
SA15bsa061_u:169_7: śrotāpyevaṃ cintayati - yadanena kathitaṃ tanmayā pratītam /
SA15bsa061_u:170_0: ekahetunā samutthāpakena ye sambhūte te ekahetusambhūte /
SA15bsa061_u:170_3: tathāpi tayoḥ ya ekahetusambhūte kriyāvāgākārakajñāne ta ekārthapratītiniyamād vijñaptitvena vyapadiśyete /
SA15bsa061_u:171_2: ekaḥ taimirikaḥ dvitīyaṃ taimirikaṃ 'paśya' iti “aparaṃ candraṃ' darśayati /
SA15bsa061_u:173_2: aviṣayatve tu kathaṃ jñānena paracittasattā pratīyate? tatsvarūpājñāne
SA15bsa061_u:174_2: tadeva kāryaliṅgam / tasmājjātaṃ kriyādipratibhāsivijñānāt kāryaliṅgājjātaṃ yat paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkaroti āhosvinneti dvidhā parīkṣā /
SA15bsa061_u:174_4: yadi nāma viṣayīkaroti, tadā tasya viṣayaḥ pṛthak syāt /
SA15bsa061_u:174_6: atha na viṣayīkaroti, tadā kathaṃ paracittasattā jñāyate? kathaṃ na jñāyate? āha - tatsvarūpājñāna ityādi /
SA15bsa061_u:174_8: sa tu tadabhāve na bhavatīti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:177_0: kriyāvāgbhyāṃ paracittapratipattimatāmapi tatsvarūpaviṣayīkaraṇe svacittajñānavattadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa061_u:177_1: tadajñāne tu tena tatsvarūpasya grahaṇaṃ katham /
SA15bsa061_u:178_0: kriyāvāgbhyāmityādi / kiñca yadā bāhyārthāvādibhiḥ kriyāvāgbhyāṃ liṅgābhyāṃ paracittaṃ jñāyate,
SA15bsa061_u:178_1: tadā tasya paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkriyata āhosvinna? yadi nāma viṣayīkriyate,
SA15bsa061_u:178_3: atha na viṣayīkriyate, tadā tena jñānena pratipattrā vā kathaṃ jñāyeta? /
SA15bsa061_u:180_0: atha liṅgāt sāmānyādhigateḥ nākārasya pratītiriti cet?
SA15bsa061_u:180_1: atha liṅgāt sāmānyādhigate ityādi / yasmālliṅgaṃ sāmānyena vyāptam, na tu viśeṣeṇa /
SA15bsa061_u:180_2: tasmātsāmānyameva jñāyate, na viśeṣa iti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā // 68 //
SA15bsa061_u:183_0: kiñca tatsāmānyamityādi / kiñca tatsāmānyaṃ paracittameva vā,
SA15bsa061_u:185_0: anyatvāvācyatvayorekatve tvanena tatsāmānyameva gṛhyeta, na paracittam /
SA15bsa061_u:187_2: na paracittam / tasmāt kathamanena jñānena tat paracittaṃ jñāyate? avācyatvapakṣe 'pi eṣa eva nayaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:189_0: nāpi sāmānyaṃ paracittameva / tathā sati tadākārastāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta ityuktam /
SA15bsa061_u:190_4: tadā paracittākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta ityuktaṃ prāk /
SA15bsa061_u:192_0: na hyeṣā anumānaprakriyā / na hyeṣā anumānaprakriyeti // 72 //
SA15bsa061_u:194_5: kathanna svalakṣaṇasya grāhakatveneṣyate cet? āha - pratibhāsāviśiṣṭatvādeḥ prasaṅgāditi /
SA15bsa061_u:197_0: tena nāsya prāmāṇyamiti / pratibhāsāviśiṣṭatvādāvabhyupagate sati anumānenārthasvarūpasya grahaṇam /
SA15bsa061_u:197_1: tena bhavatu prāmāṇyamiti cet? naiṣa nyāyaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:198_0: yadi pramāṇasya svalakṣaṇagrahaṇanibandhanatvaṃ neṣyate, tatkathamasya pramāṇyamiti cedāha -
SA15bsa061_u:200_2: kvacit granthe 'tena nāsya prāmāṇyam' iti pāṭhaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:200_4: tadā pramāṇameva na taditi / yadi anumānena svalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhyeta,
SA15bsa061_u:200_5: tarhi pramāṇameva neṣyate / katham? āha - tatsvarūpāgrahe 'pītyādi /
SA15bsa061_u:203_0: dhūmādiliṅgājjātamapītyādi / na hi dhūmādiliṅgājjātamanumānaṃ vahnyādeḥ svarūpasya grāhakatveneṣyate /
SA15bsa061_u:204_0: syādetat - paracittānumāne tasyāvisaṃvāditvameva nāsti / ata āha -
SA15bsa061_u:208_0: tatpravartanadvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttau tadādhipatyādāgatārthasya prāpteḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:209_2: taddvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya yadi punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttimabhilāṣavyāyāmānyatrānyatragamanādikāṃ kuryāt,
SA15bsa061_u:209_6: atha vā punaḥ punarvyahāre pravartanamiti saṃlāpādanu gṛhapraveśaḥ,
SA15bsa061_u:209_7: tadanu āsanadānam, tadanu cānnapānadānam, tadanu ca śayyāsanaprajñapanam,
SA15bsa061_u:210_0: kiṃ punaruttaravyahārasādhanāya prāmāṇyamiṣyata iti cet? ata āha -
SA15bsa061_u:212_3: mātreti śabdaḥ māne / yo lokaḥ tanmātraphalaṃ cintayati saḥ tanmātraphalacintakaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:215_2: tathā pratibhāsituṃ śīlaṃ yasya jñānasya tattathā /
SA15bsa061_u:215_5: tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam / tasmāt nirākāṅkṣatvāt / evamuktaṃ bhavati - yadā puruṣasya vahnyupalabdheranu dāhādipratibhāsijñānānubhavodayaḥ,
SA15bsa061_u:216_1: kintu kathaṃ tanmātreṇa pūrvajñānasya prāmāṇyamiti cet? āha -
SA15bsa061_u:220_2: kathaṃ na yujyate? āha - tadānīṃ sarveṣāṃ jñānānāmityādi /
SA15bsa061_u:222_0: tatra vijñaptijñānaṃ na kadāciccittaspandanādhipatyena vinā udbhavatītyataḥ tābhyāṃ te anumīyete /
SA15bsa061_u:223_0: tatra vijñaptijñānamityādi / kriyāvāgākārakaṃ jñānaṃ spandanādhipatyena vinā nodbhavati /
SA15bsa061_u:223_2: viśeṣastvasyeṣaḥ - tato 'pio upaplutāvasthāyāṃ vyavahitādhipatyāt paramparayā udayaḥ,
SA15bsa061_u:224_0: evaṃ vijñaptijñānānāmubhayorapyavasthayoḥ spandanāyattatvaṃ sādhayitvā svapnāvasthāyāṃ vijñaptijñānād uttarakālabhāvijñānāni yathā spandanāyattāni bhavanti tathā pratipādayitumāha - tatra yathā pūrvavijñaptijñānānāṃ paramparayā spandanādhipatyādudayaḥ tathā taduttarāvasthābhāvināmapi /
SA15bsa061_u:225_3: tatra paramparā tvevam - jāgradavasthāyāṃ prathamaṃ tāvat paraspandanādhipatyād vijñaptijñāne,
SA15bsa061_u:228_0: vijñaptijñānāśrayetyādi / jāgradavasthāyāṃ vijñaptijñānasyāśrayo yatparasantānavartispandanaṃ tasya uttarāvasthā,
SA15bsa061_u:229_0: syānmatam - bhavatu paramparayotpādaḥ, vyabhicārastu tadavastha eva / ata evāha -
SA15bsa061_u:230_0: tatrāpi yādṛganumānaṃ tādṛgavisaṃvādo vyavahāraścāpyastyeveti kenāpi na gṛhyete /
SA15bsa061_u:231_0: tatrā yādṛganumānamityādi / svapnāvasthāyāmapi yādṛk yāvatkālaṃ paracittasya anumānaṃ tādṛk tāvatkālamātraṃ saṃlāpādirūpo 'visaṃvādo 'styeva /
SA15bsa061_u:231_4: ta evaṃ vyācakṣate - tatra svapnāvasthāyāmapi kāryaliṅgasya kāraṇe 'vyabhicārād yādṛk utpattidharmatayā paramparayā pūrvajñānasyānumānam,
SA15bsa061_u:234_0: sākṣāt paracittavidāṃ tu katham? yadi tāvat paracittasya svarūpaṃ sākṣāt jānanti,
SA15bsa061_u:235_0: paracittānumānenetyādi / paracittānumānena tatsvarūpāgrahe 'pyavisaṃvādād bhavatu tasya prāmāṇyam,
SA15bsa061_u:235_1: ye tu sākṣāt paracittavidaḥ teṣāṃ tu katham? yadi tāvat paracittasya svarūpaṃ sākṣājjānanti,
SA15bsa061_u:235_3: atha na jānanti, tadā kathaṃ te yoginaḥ sākṣādvida iti matam /
SA15bsa061_u:237_1: atha na gṛhyate, kathaṃ tarhi pramaṇamiti cet?
SA15bsa061_u:238_3: kīdṛk tatpratyakṣam? arthasvarūpāgrahaṇe pramāṇatvaṃ nirākartumāha - atha na gṛhyate kathaṃ tarhi pramāṇamiti /
SA15bsa061_u:241_1: aprahīṇaḥ grāhyagrāhakavikalpo yeṣāṃ yogināṃ teṣāṃ tathā /
SA15bsa061_u:241_2: teṣāṃ yat paracittajñānaṃ tad vyavahāre 'visaṃvādādeva pramāṇam,
SA15bsa061_u:241_4: na tu svarūpagrahaṇāt / aprahīṇagrāhyagrāhakavikalpasya hetum āha - āśrayāparāvṛtteriti /
SA15bsa061_u:242_0: yadi paracittajñānaṃ na svarūpasya grāhakam, kathaṃ tarhi tat sphuṭākārakaṃ bhavatīti cet? āha -
SA15bsa061_u:243_2: yogabalāddhītyādi / bhāvanābalāddhi yogināṃ paracittajñānaṃ paracittākāraviśeṣānukāri sphuṭamupajāyate,
SA15bsa061_u:243_3: yathā karmabalād devādyadhiṣṭhānabalācca satyasvapnadarśināṃ jñānaṃ sphuṭamarthākāramudeti /
SA15bsa061_u:244_0: yadyevaṃ cintyeta - bhavatu bhāvanābalādeva yogināṃ paracittajñānam,
SA15bsa061_u:245_1: te 'pi tadākārasadṛśasvacittapratibhāsameva jānantītyevamavadhāraṇād paracittavida iti vyavahāraḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:245_3: tat bhāvanābalājjātamapi paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkartuṃ na samartham /
SA15bsa061_u:245_5: yadi yoginaḥ paracittasya svarūpaṃ na jānanti,
SA15bsa061_u:245_6: kathaṃ paracittavida ityavadhāryate cet? āha - te 'pi svacittapratibhāsam ityādi /
SA15bsa061_u:245_7: yogino 'pi paracittākārasadṛśena svacittapratibhāsenaiva paracittaṃ jānanti [iti paracittavidaḥ] ityevamavadhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā vyavahāraḥ pravartate /
SA15bsa061_u:246_0: yadi tat svarūpaṃ na gṛhṇāti, kathaṃ tarhi pratyakṣam? kathaṃ ca prāmāṇyamiti cedāha -
SA15bsa061_u:247_4: tasmāt pratyakṣamiti matam / yasmāccāvisaṃvādi tasmāt pramāṇam /
SA15bsa061_u:248_2: āhosvinna / yadi karoti, tasyārtho 'rthāntaraṃ syāt / atha na karoti, tadā bhagavataḥ jñānamapyayathārtha syāditi cet? āha -
SA15bsa061_u:249_3: acintyo hi yogivaryāṇāṃ tathā gatānāṃ buddhagocaraḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:251_5: lokottarajñānasvabhāvatvāt / pratyavekṣaṇajñānaṃ lokottarajñānapṛṣṭhalabdhagrāhyagrāhakavikalpasaṃprayuktāt sarvasūkṣmāvṛtavyavahitavastūnāṃ sarvākāraṃ jānātītyataḥ laukikasarvākārajñānam,
SA15bsa061_u:252_6: tadevaṃ bhagavataḥ sarvārthajñānam eteṣu caturṣu yathāyogaṃ yojanīyam /
